meanings.sent1: The untiring worker completed the task without feeling exhausted.
meanings.sent2: She showed untiring energy during the entire marathon.
meanings.sent3: The untiring squirrel kept running on the wheel for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her untiring spirit was like a never-ending flame.
meanings.sent5: The untiring waves crashed against the shore relentlessly.

meanings.sent1: His untiring dedication to his studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: The untiring athlete practiced every day to improve his skills.
meanings.sent3: The untiring gardener refused to give up on growing the perfect rose.
meanings.sent4: Her untiring pursuit of justice inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The untiring ant marched on, carrying a heavy load many times its size.
